gift_source:

What does MSER stand for?
{
= Maximally Stable Extremal Regions
~ Multi-Scale Edge Response
~ Minimum Stable Edge Regions
~ Multi-Scale Error Reduction
}
title: MC1
question: What does MSER stand for?

gift_source:
::MC2::
What is the basis of MSER detection?
{
= Stability of regions across intensity thresholds
~ Eigenvalue analysis
~ Gradient magnitude
~ Circular neighborhood test
}
title: MC2
question: What is the basis of MSER detection?

choices.text: Stability of regions across intensity thresholds

}

question: Match the detector to feature type.
